column4: ok the error I get when trying to make the drive ext3 after making free space on a ext3 drive  is check file system on /dev/hda1 for errors and fix if possible...any help with this?
that is not an error, that is just a status message
that is what it stops with
no...it has a red minus thing next to it..saying it didn't complete
is there some recomended options I should use?
I think -y to fix them, but if you run it without options it will at least report errors
it just comes up asking for options if I don't give it any
(of course you also need to specify a device)
